meaningMnemonic:
When the <kanji>occurrence</kanji> of your <kanji>task</kanji>s is in the same <kanji>place</kanji> every day, that place is probably an <vocabulary>office</vocabulary>.

事務所 is often for office spaces that handle back-office 事務 (administrative or clerical work). It can also be used for offices that offer more specialized services, like a 会計事務所 (accounting <vocabulary>firm</vocabulary>) or 芸能事務所 (talent <vocabulary>agency</vocabulary>).
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
